title: Harvard Online Courses in Data Science – 'Data Science Machine Learning'
description: Introduction to machine learning basics, cross-validation, popular machine learning algorithms, recommendation systems, and regularization.

title: Harvard Online Courses in Data Science – 'Introduction to Data Science with Python'
description: Hands-on experience with Python programming, data modeling, statistics, and machine learning.

title: CNRS Online Course – 'Introduction au Deep Learning'
description: Foundations of deep learning, natural language processing (NLP), and generative AI with PyTorch and Keras.

title: Telecom Paris Online Course – 'Fundamentals of Big Data'
description: Introduction to the basics of big data, covering Python, databases, algebra, probability, statistics, and the perceptron.

title: University of Cambridge Online Courses in Finance – 'Foundations of Finance'
description: Foundations of finance, including corporate finance, cash flows, risk management, interest, return, and financial reporting.

title: IBM Course – 'Mastering Generative AI: Model Foundations and NLP'
description: Introduction to NLP, generative AI, word2vec, N-grams, sequence-to-sequence models, and text generation evaluation.

title: MIT Online Courses in Finance – 'MITx's Finance MicroMasters® Program'
description: Foundations of modern finance including corporate finance, risk management, derivatives pricing, portfolio theory, and asset pricing models.
